title: Unhinged: Putting the Pieces Back Together
description: Putting the Pieces Back Together by Olena Rose showcases the unshakable strength and perseverance of the human spirit during times of romantic turmoil. Through emotionally-charged poetic storytelling, the reader is taken on a journey of healing and transformation that gains momentum page by page. By book’s end, one is instilled with an unwavering sense of self-empowerment and confidence to overcome any challenges of the heart. ★★★★★“Olena Rose has masterfully penned a collection of poetry that empowers, encourages, and uplifts. Her wise words have the power to awaken one to their innate courage that allows them to tackle any obstacle. Unhinged is an unbridled testament of all-encompassing healing.” -- Eva Xan, freelance editor and writer
author: Olena Rose
